DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to assess the safety of Oral Rotarix® under clinical practice; and collect information regarding typical symptoms of intussusceptions and bloody stool in Japan.
DOC.detailed_description: This is non-interventional study conducted in one group received Oral Rotarix®. This surveillance is abbreviated as SMILER (Surveillance and Monitoring In Living clinical Experience for Rotarix).
DOC.criteria: • Infants who receive Rotarix for the first time to prevent rotavirus gastroenteritis, an indication of Rotarix, will be included in the investigation. • All infants included in the special drug use investigation of Oral Rotarix will be excluded.
